clients.name: TechNova Solutions
clients.notes: TechNova has experienced rapid growth over the past three years, expanding from 50 to 250 employees, and now operates with a hybrid workforce (60% remote). They've recently suffered a minor phishing incident that exposed some internal emails but no customer data was compromised. The company is seeking an audit to improve their cybersecurity posture ahead of pursuing SOC 2 compliance.

clients.name: MedSecure Health Systems
clients.notes: Large healthcare provider with multiple facilities. Recently implemented new EHR system and needs HIPAA compliance assessment. Has experienced previous data breaches and is under regulatory scrutiny. Requires comprehensive security audit and ongoing monitoring.

clients.name: GreenEnergy Corp
clients.notes: Renewable energy company with critical infrastructure. Subject to NERC CIP requirements and needs comprehensive cybersecurity framework. Recently expanded operations and requires updated risk assessment.

clients.name: FinTech Innovations
clients.notes: Startup fintech company developing payment processing solutions. Needs PCI DSS compliance and general cybersecurity framework. Limited security resources but high regulatory requirements.

clients.name: EduTech Learning Platform
clients.notes: Online education platform handling student data and payment information. Needs FERPA compliance and general data protection measures. Recently experienced credential stuffing attacks.
